directions: Pour soy milk and flax seeds into a blender. Allow flax seeds to soften, 1 to 3 minutes. Turn blender on and add yogurt, strawberries, banana, carrots, and coconut, blending well after each addition. Add blueberries and blend until smooth.
ingredients: 3 ounces baby carrots, cut into chunks
title: Marlene's Yogurt Berry Smoothie
